column4: hi, I reinstalled ubuntu after an HD crash on a new HD but for some reason I noticed this new installation is using too much CPU ... (I am running 9.04 and I was running it before too) it seems like my CPU is always above 60% even when I am not running any big programs (top shows that Xorg is taking a constant 15%!!)
http://omploader.org/vMjgyag htop is at the top
the command is somthing like /usr/X11%6/bin/X : 0 -br -audit 0 -auth /bar/lib/gdm/L0.Xauth -nolisten  tcp vt7
that's what htop shows to be using ~15% of the cpu (although the total cpu usage it shows is 60%)
